backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor managing debate state with methods to get status, start debates (with HEM_Override_Key emergency detection), abort debates, and top-up canisters; includes migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that preserves DebateState during canister upgrades by copying currentState from old actor to new actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features: Internet Identity integration with login button (REQ-36) and High-Stakes UI lock for authenticated-only transcript/TTS access (REQ-37).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of 11 frontend files covering authentication, voice recognition, TTS, debate display with auth-gated content, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH-based neutral grayscale design system supporting light and dark modes for technical infrastructure aesthetics.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for 'The Gang' application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component with Internet Identity authentication UI (prominent login/logout button), push-to-talk interface, debate monitoring, interrupt controls, and authentication status badges with visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/DebateDisplay.ts: Real-time debate display with High-Stakes UI lock that blurs/hides Robby's transcript and disables TTS when unauthenticated, showing locked overlay with authentication requirement.
Interrupt button component that cancels active speech synthesis and calls backend abort_debate to immediately stop debates.
frontend/src/components/PushToTalkButton: Push-to-talk button using browser SpeechRecognition API with visual feedback during recording and automatic transcript capture on completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity integration, automatically recreating actor when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for debate operations: useDebateStatus polls backend every 500ms, useStartBoardroomDebate initiates debates, and useAbortDebate interrupts them.
Custom hook wrapping browser SpeechRecognition API for voice input, providing start/stop controls, transcript state, and error handling with browser compatibility detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Custom hook for text-to-speech using browser SpeechSynthesis API, with voice selection logic prioritizing British male voices and providing speak/cancel controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeWordStub.ts: Commented-out stub for future Picovoice Porcupine wake word detection integration to trigger speech recognition automatically.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, including design tokens for UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/transcriptParser.ts: Utility function that sanitizes transcript text by removing HTML table tags and converting URLs and markdown links to clickable anchor elements.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing The Gang multi-agent system architecture with 9 canisters, sovereignty constraints, storage limits, inter-canister communication patterns, and implemented features including real-time debate UI with speech recognition.
